Articles.Content:
**REQUIRES BDARMORY**: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/85209-1-0-BDArmory-v0-8-1-%28AI-pilots-smarter-guards-etc%29-Dev-Thread-May-3](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/85209-1-0-BDArmory-v0-8-1-%28AI-pilots-smarter-guards-etc%29-Dev-Thread-May-3)

Ever wanted to build a tank in KSP?

Using SC Panzer Parts, you can!

Download: [http://www.curse.com/ksp-mods/kerbal/228385-sc-panzer-parts](http://www.curse.com/ksp-mods/kerbal/228385-sc-panzer-parts)

![7Y3a4Zx.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/7Y3a4Zx.jpg)

![W6HFRht.png](http://i.imgur.com/W6HFRht.png)

My tank pack: [http://www.curse.com/shareables/kerbal/229077-sc-panzers-tanks-for-sc-panzer-parts](http://www.curse.com/shareables/kerbal/229077-sc-panzers-tanks-for-sc-panzer-parts)

![ygC86Vy.png](http://i.imgur.com/ygC86Vy.png)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-08T19:18:58Z" title="05/08/2015 07:18  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 8, 2015</time> by Spooglecraft**
Yay! Updated. I love this. Good work!
I hear somewhere that you have a 800mm, i'm skeptical...
Don't mean to ....., but could you please post updated pictures of your parts pack, please?
I would recommend just using cannon shells and not flooding the list with so many new types of ammo but it looks promising

> 
> I would recommend just using cannon shells and not flooding the list with so many new types of ammo but it looks promising

I think about using a Firespitter-like FuelSwitch module. Shouldn't be too hard, so noted for future updates.

This is by far my favorite BDarmory add-on. The sheer diversity of the guns makes it my favorite. I'm not going to lie though. The 800mm is my favorite cannon. I have laughed sooo many times at the sheer power and recoil of that thing. I've even tried to make an AC-130-ish plane with an 800mm on it, and I can tell you that that flight didn't last long.

10/10 Would recommend mod
Is this going to get updated?
So what actually guides your missiles? I've tried laser guidance, doesn't seem to work.

> 
> So what actually guides your missiles? I've tried laser guidance, doesn't seem to work.

This mod has not yet been updated.

> 
> So what actually guides your missiles? I've tried laser guidance, doesn't seem to work.

GPS works.
Wow! iam going to add some pics of my tank soon.![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")
